name: Skyrogue (7DRL 2019)
description:
Take to the skies in a daring heist of  Lord Vannas' infamous treasure fleet!  Sneak you way through 5 levels of moderate thievery, swift evasion and a little bit of magical assistance.

King's rules apply - every time you move, so do the guards! Keep out of their line of sight and steal as much treasure as you can, then make your way to the floor exit!

Things

  • Guards: Avoid these!
  • Treasure: Grab this!
  • Chests: Open these for more loot!
  • Keys: Open locked doors!
  • Blinkstones: Mystery green stone that allows you  one charge of Blink! Blinkstone charges will gradually recharge after use!
  • Lack of safety rails: Don't fall off!

Controls

  • Arrows:  Move 1 square in a direction.
  • Z: Wait a turn
  • X: Hold, then press an arrow key to blink 5 squares in that direction.  Requires Blinkstone charge. 

Hints

  • Don't blink into guards!
  • Don't blink off the edge of the ship!
  • Guards can be evaded with blink or by quickly moving out of sight. Confused guards will then return to their patrol route.
  • I think I made level 2 too difficult?

Created in 7 days for 7DRL entirely in Pico-8.
